Technique: FORMED BY HAND; ENGRAVED; PAINTED; ENGRAVED
Name: Hedgehog
Description: This small figurine in faience represents a hedgehog on a socle. The muzzle sits on a kind of ring which probably served as a fastener. The back of the animal is divided into squares, showing in this way its many prickles. On the base, one notices several hieroglyphs of which one is the name of the goddess Bastet.
